Package net.allwebdesign.common.lib.utils

Class Summary
AmountToLiteral Converts an amount to litteral
ApplicationProperties A class holding Application Properties.
BigDecimalAdapter Used when returning amounts from a function in particular in web services.
Use the below annotations in those cases above the method:
@XmlElement(required = true)
@XmlJavaTypeAdapter(BigDecimalAdapter.class)
@XmlSchemaType(name = "decimal")
DataValidator  
EncryptionService An encrypted password generator class
SendMail A class with methods to easily send send emails
Utils A class which serves as a toolkit of useful methods
It includes the following:
- normalize: sorts and converts a Map to Map
